channel.title: Virtualbox Guru Meditation on Whonix Gateway
channel.description: I was using Whonix and noticed that the Gateway was shutdown due to Virtualbox Guru Meditation as I was web surfing. Would my home IP address be exposed as I was using Tor browser with flash in the Workstation with the Gateway not being up and running in this situation?

item.title: Virtualbox Guru Meditation on Whonix Gateway
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
I donâ€™t think so. Whonix-Workstation is specifically designed and tested to not be able to establish any connections when Whonix-Gateway is offline.

Read full topic
item.source: Virtualbox Guru Meditation on Whonix Gateway
